name: Bow Hunting Africa: Savannah Lion & Wild Animals hunter
name_original: Bow Hunting Africa: Savannah Lion & Wild Animals hunter
description:
Prepare for the ultimate hunting challenge with Wild Africa: Savannah Bow Hunt. If you got bored with “sniper zombie WW2” games and need some more sophisticated wild hunting entertainment - download Wild Africa: Savannah Bow Hunt! This game will get you to the very best wild hunting grounds in Africa. It’s absolutely free, gives you plenty of fun and relax while shooting bow and hunting wild animals in savannah (Lion, Zebra, Rhino, Hippo)! Wild Africa: Savannah Bow Hunt is a free hunting game you want to play! Master your bow technique, become the master archer. Be a hunter! Bow shooting gives you ultimate experience of an archer, brings you the whole new way of having fun with shooting and hunting in wild african hunting grounds. Tap the screen to stretch the bow and shoot. Enjoy the plenty of levels, beautiful wild 3d american environment, real life animals you can hunt only in north america, wind factor and the most realistic bowhunting experience games ever offered. Hunt with bow like never before. Become the archery master!

Wild Africa: Savannah Bow Hunt gives you:
Beautiful african environment in 3D


Realistic archery & bowhunting experience
Stunning 3D graphics
Ultimate hunting experience
Plenty of different levels
Real life animals
Varied difficulty of the game
Power ups
Playing for Free - no “in-app purchases” (no IAP)
High score
Different arrows and bows
Plenty of fun!

How to play:

Simply tap and hold the screen to stretch the bow and aim. Release when ready to shoot. Be quick! The bow starts shaking when stretched for too long! Remember about the wind factor! The bow reloads arrows automatically, so you can focus on aiming the targets. Remember that you can look around!

There are two types of gameplay:

Time Attack: Get as many hits/points as you can in a limited time.

Archery Mastery: You get only couple of arrows and have to hit all the targets. Precision, focus and skill is required.
